items.title: Israel-Palestine: the bereaved parents bringing hope to a divided land
bullets: • Palestinians and Israelis are working to build peace where politics has failed
• They are united in loss: specifically, the loss of a child
• Something else unites them: a determination to build bridges of shared understanding
• The fighting has to end, and bereaved parents are better placed than most to achieve that

• It’s also responsible for 700m acres of underground minerals, including major reserves of oil, natural gas and coal

items.title: Why do only some leaves turn red in the fall? Scientists can't agree on an answer
bullets: • Scientists can't agree on why only some autumn leaves turn red in the fall
• Every autumn, trees break down chlorophyll in their leaves to recover precious nitrogen before the leaves fall
• The loss of this chlorophll exposes yellow pigments that have been there in the leaves all along

items.title: California man who survived 20 days in snowy wilderness says it was walk or die

items.title: Trump once again nominates tech space traveler Jared Isaacman to serve as NASA administrator
bullets: • Trump once again nominates tech space traveler Jared Isaacman to serve as NASA administrator

• Trump announced in late May that he had decided to withdraw Isaacman after a "thorough review" of his "prior associations" Weeks after the withdrawal, Trump went further in expressing his concerns about Isaacman's Republican credentials
• Trump made no mention of his previous decision to nominate Isaacman in his Tuesday evening announcement

• That amount could’ve paid for SNAP benefits for 7.5 million Americans, according to Warren's office
• Amazon's anticipated tax break for this year is similarly large at around $15.7 billion
• Microsoft's estimated $12.5 billion tax cut in 2026 could lower Affordable Care Act premiums

items.title: Tesla rewards Elon Musk’s reality-distortion field
bullets: • The most striking moment of Tesla’s annual shareholder meeting Thursday wasn’t when Elon Musk won a impossible-sounding pay package worth nearly $1 trillion

• But the more illuminating moment was when the gathered crowd of shareholders booed a proposal by New York State Comptroller Thomas DiNapoli to repeal a new bylaw making it impossible for regular shareholders to sue the company

items.title: The Polestar 4 takes EV minimalism to the next level
bullets: • Swedish EV company Polestar has launched two additional models: the spacious 3 compact crossover SUV, and now the 4, a sporty, even more compact SUV
• The 4 slotting in between the 2 and 3 in size may confound some consumers
• The real elephant in the room is no glass on the rear hatch, which no doubt makes it stick out on the road

• The film is set to be the first time it has been released since 1987
• It's directed by the same director who directed the original version of the film
• The movie is based on the story of a young girl who was born in the early 1900s

items.title: Weekend projections: Paramount claims top spot for Regretting You on exceptionally quiet weekend
bullets: • The combined box office of all movies reporting so far stands at less than $50 million
• The one bright spot is arguably a surprise win for Regretting You, which is holding quite well in its second weekend
• Paramount is expecting another good day today, with $3.1 million, compared to Universal’s prediction of $2.09 million
